ygData.subject: Re: Oasis, the other side...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe, actually I paid a little visit to there already.   The frogs don t hate me yet, so I thought I d look around some.   I m kinda worried about hurting
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
>Hey scot, I just wanted to point out to you as a higher level monk looking
>back on his youthfull days that now is the perfect time for you and your
>group to go down to guk

Hehe, actually I paid a little visit to there already. The frogs don't
hate me yet, so I thought I'd look around some. I'm kinda worried about
hurting my faction with the frogs, as I've heard it can be a pain to hunt
Lower Guk later if the live frogs hate you. Is it worth the pain to have
them hate me just for mesh armor? I figure I can always buy mesh. = )
What else will I spend my money on (besides jewelry)?

>just some advice.

Thanks!

Dornn, slayer of Dorn (okay, okay so I was grouped), Level 15 monk, Brell
Serilis
